QUOTE: We can have no progress without change, whether it be basketball or anything else.
AUTHOR: John Wooden

QUOTE: God, give us grace to accept with serenity the things that cannot be changed, courage to change the things which should be changed and the wisdom to distinguish the one from the other.
AUTHOR: Reinhold Niebuhr

QUOTE: In a decaying society, art, if it is truthful, must also reflect decay. And unless it wants to break faith with its social function, art must show the world as changeable. And help to change it.
AUTHOR: Ernst Fischer

QUOTE: Science arose from poetry... when times change the two can meet again on a higher level as friends.
AUTHOR: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

QUOTE: Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
AUTHOR: Niels Bohr

QUOTE: Don't knock the weather nine-tenths of the people couldn't start a conversation if it didn't change once in a while.
AUTHOR: Kin Hubbard

QUOTE: I was willing to accept what I couldn't change.
AUTHOR: Abdul Kalam

QUOTE: If death meant just leaving the stage long enough to change costume and come back as a new character, would you slow down? Or speed up?
AUTHOR: Chuck Palahniuk

QUOTE: It is often when night looks darkest, it is often before the fever breaks that one senses the gathering momentum for change, when one feels that resurrection of hope in the midst of despair and apathy.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: There is no progress whatever. Everything is just the same as it was thousands, and tens of thousands, of years ago. The outward form changes. The essence does not change.
AUTHOR: Robert Louis Stevenson

QUOTE: Miracles happen everyday, change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you.
AUTHOR: Jon Bon Jovi

QUOTE: This is the America that I love. This is a great people. We can do anything. We can achieve anything. We've got a government that has gotten in the way of the American people. We're going to change that in November.
AUTHOR: Mitt Romney

QUOTE: Constitutions should consist only of general provisions the reason is that they must necessarily be permanent, and that they cannot calculate for the possible change of things.
AUTHOR: Alexander Hamilton

QUOTE: Instead of giving a politician the keys to the city, it might be better to change the locks.
AUTHOR: Doug Larson

QUOTE: I wanted to change the world. But I have found that the only thing one can be sure of changing is oneself.
AUTHOR: Aldous Huxley

QUOTE: Climate change is a terrible problem, and it absolutely needs to be solved. It deserves to be a huge priority.
AUTHOR: Bill Gates

QUOTE: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
AUTHOR: Miguel Angel Ruiz

QUOTE: We now accept the fact that learning is a lifelong process of keeping abreast of change. And the most pressing task is to teach people how to learn.
AUTHOR: Peter Drucker

QUOTE: The simplest questions are the most profound. Where were you born? Where is your home? Where are you going? What are you doing? Think about these once in a while and watch your answers change.
AUTHOR: Richard Bach

QUOTE: Early in life I had to choose between honest arrogance and hypocritical humility. I chose the former and have seen no reason to change.
AUTHOR: Frank Lloyd Wright

QUOTE: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
AUTHOR: Soren Kierkegaard

QUOTE: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.
AUTHOR: Abraham Maslow

QUOTE: Time heals griefs and quarrels, for we change and are no longer the same persons. Neither the offender nor the offended are any more themselves.
AUTHOR: Blaise Pascal

QUOTE: Favor comes because for a brief moment in the great space of human change and progress some general human purpose finds in him a satisfactory embodiment.
AUTHOR: Franklin D. Roosevelt

QUOTE: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: Only God who made us can touch us and change us and save us from ourselves.
AUTHOR: Billy Graham

QUOTE: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
AUTHOR: Peter Drucker

QUOTE: The challenges of change are always hard. It is important that we begin to unpack those challenges that confront this nation and realize that we each have a role that requires us to change and become more responsible for shaping our own future.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
AUTHOR: Keri Russell

QUOTE: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
AUTHOR: Jack Layton

QUOTE: Try to realize it's all within yourself no one else can make you change, and to see you're only very small and life flows on within you and without you.
AUTHOR: George Harrison

QUOTE: I think it's naive to pray for world peace if we're not going to change the form in which we live.
AUTHOR: Godfrey Reggio

QUOTE: Science fiction is any idea that occurs in the head and doesn't exist yet, but soon will, and will change everything for everybody, and nothing will ever be the same again. As soon as you have an idea that changes some small part of the world you are writing science fiction. It is always the art of the possible, never the impossible.
AUTHOR: Ray Bradbury

QUOTE: It is absolutely impossible to transcend the laws of nature. What can change in historically different circumstances is only the form in which these laws expose themselves.
AUTHOR: Karl Marx

QUOTE: No one can persuade another to change. Each of us guards a gate of change that can only be opened from the inside. We cannot open the gate of another, either by argument or emotional appeal.
AUTHOR: Marilyn Ferguson

QUOTE: He who is fixed to a star does not change his mind.
AUTHOR: Leonardo da Vinci

QUOTE: Countries such as the U.S. and Britain have taken it upon themselves to decide for us in the developing world, even to interfere in our domestic affairs and to bring about what they call regime change.
AUTHOR: Robert Mugabe

QUOTE: People are always looking for the single magic bullet that will totally change everything. There is no single magic bullet.
AUTHOR: Temple Grandin

QUOTE: Each child is an adventure into a better life - an opportunity to change the old pattern and make it new.
AUTHOR: Hubert H. Humphrey

QUOTE: It is change, continuing change, inevitable change, that is the dominant factor in society today. No sensible decision can be made any longer without taking into account not only the world as it is, but the world as it will be.
AUTHOR: Isaac Asimov

QUOTE: Why does a woman work ten years to change a man's habits and then complain that he's not the man she married?
AUTHOR: Barbra Streisand

QUOTE: We are not victims of aging, sickness and death. These are part of scenery, not the seer, who is immune to any form of change. This seer is the spirit, the expression of eternal being.
AUTHOR: Deepak Chopra

QUOTE: A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves.
AUTHOR: Marcel Proust

QUOTE: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature.
AUTHOR: Edmund Burke

QUOTE: Revolution, n. In politics, an abrupt change in the form of misgovernment.
AUTHOR: Ambrose Bierce

QUOTE: In too many instances, the march to globalization has also meant the marginalization of women and girls. And that must change.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: Often times when you face such an overwhelming challenge as global climate change, it can be somewhat daunting - it's kind of like trying to lose weight, which I know something about.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: I'm one of those people who thinks that changing one's hair is the only part of the body that you can change at will.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.
AUTHOR: Eddie Vedder

QUOTE: Dynamism is a function of change.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: On some campuses, change is effected through nonviolent or even violent means.
AUTHOR: Hillary Clinton

QUOTE: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
AUTHOR: Joel A. Barker

QUOTE: I am an optimist because I want to change things for the better and I know that blood has to be spilled and disharmony and cruelty are necessary to do that.
AUTHOR: Henry Rollins

QUOTE: It's good for everyone to understand that they are to love their enemies, simply because your enemies show you things about yourself you need to change. So in actuality enemies are friends in reverse.
AUTHOR: Gary Busey

QUOTE: All conservatism is based upon the idea that if you leave things alone you leave them as they are. But you do not. If you leave a thing alone you leave it to a torrent of change.
AUTHOR: Gilbert K. Chesterton

QUOTE: Company cultures are like country cultures. Never try to change one. Try, instead, to work with what you've got.
AUTHOR: Peter Drucker

QUOTE: Policies are many, Principles are few, Policies will change, Principles never do.
AUTHOR: John C. Maxwell

QUOTE: I don't believe in the after life, although I am bringing a change of underwear.
AUTHOR: Woody Allen

QUOTE: Isn't life a series of images that change as they repeat themselves?
AUTHOR: Andy Warhol

QUOTE: Forget about the consequences of failure. Failure is only a temporary change in direction to set you straight for your next success.
AUTHOR: Denis Waitley

QUOTE: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
AUTHOR: Bertrand Russell

QUOTE: As a rock star, I have two instincts, I want to have fun, and I want to change the world. I have a chance to do both.
AUTHOR: Bono

QUOTE: It is evident that skepticism, while it makes no actual change in man, always makes him feel better.
AUTHOR: Ambrose Bierce

QUOTE: If we go on the way we have, the fault is our greed and if we are not willing to change, we will disappear from the face of the globe, to be replaced by the insect.
AUTHOR: Jacques Yves Cousteau

QUOTE: The 'self-image' is the key to human personality and human behavior. Change the self image and you change the personality and the behavior.
AUTHOR: Maxwell Maltz

QUOTE: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
AUTHOR: Tom Brokaw

QUOTE: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
AUTHOR: Nicholas Sparks

QUOTE: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
AUTHOR: Horace

QUOTE: The only difference between me and others is that they think they can change something with cute little poems, nice cards or embracing trees and being nice to little lapdogs.
AUTHOR: Henry Rollins

QUOTE: Since change is constant, you wonder if people crave death because it's the only way they can get anything really finished.
AUTHOR: Chuck Palahniuk

QUOTE: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
AUTHOR: Brian Tracy

QUOTE: If you want to know the taste of a pear, you must change the pear by eating it yourself. If you want to know the theory and methods of revolution, you must take part in revolution. All genuine knowledge originates in direct experience.
AUTHOR: Mao Zedong

QUOTE: I think women should start to embrace their age. What's the alternative to getting older? You die. I can't change the day I was born. But I can take care of my skin, my body, my mind, and try to live my life and be happy.
AUTHOR: Olivia Munn

QUOTE: A State without the means of some change is without the means of its conservation.
AUTHOR: Edmund Burke

QUOTE: Those issues are biblical issues: to care for the sick, to feed the hungry, to stand up for the oppressed. I contend that if the evangelical community became more biblical, everything would change.
AUTHOR: Tony Campolo

QUOTE: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
AUTHOR: Friedrich Schiller

QUOTE: If you don't change your beliefs, your life will be like this forever. Is that good news?
AUTHOR: W. Somerset Maugham

QUOTE: A great attitude does much more than turn on the lights in our worlds it seems to magically connect us to all sorts of serendipitous opportunities that were somehow absent before the change.
AUTHOR: Earl Nightingale

QUOTE: That last day does not bring extinction to us, but change of place.
AUTHOR: Marcus Tullius Cicero

QUOTE: It becomes more necessary to see the truth as it is if you realize that the only vehicle for change are these people who have lost their personality.
AUTHOR: Steven Biko

QUOTE: Taste may change, but inclination never.
AUTHOR: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

QUOTE: Heat of blood makes young people change their inclinations often, and habit makes old ones keep to theirs a great while.
AUTHOR: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

QUOTE: Characters do not change. Opinions alter, but characters are only developed.
AUTHOR: Benjamin Disraeli

QUOTE: We say keep your change, we'll keep our God, our guns, our constitution.
AUTHOR: Sarah Palin

QUOTE: If you want to be certain, you should never get married. You should never change jobs. In fact, you might as well just stay home. Because I don't know anybody who is certain. That need to be certain is just procrastination.
AUTHOR: Mark Burnett

QUOTE: Men do change, and change comes like a little wind that ruffles the curtains at dawn, and it comes like the stealthy perfume of wildflowers hidden in the grass.
AUTHOR: John Steinbeck

QUOTE: The great secret that all old people share is that you really haven't changed in seventy or eighty years. Your body changes, but you don't change at all. And that, of course, causes great confusion.
AUTHOR: Doris Lessing

QUOTE: A sense of blessedness comes from a change of heart, not from more blessings.
AUTHOR: Mason Cooley

QUOTE: That sort of half sigh, which, accompanied by two or three slight nods of the head, is pity's small change in general society.
AUTHOR: Charles Dickens

QUOTE: The future is not Big Government. Self-serving politicians. Powerful bureaucrats. This has been tried, tested throughout history. The result has always been disaster. President Obama, your agenda is not new. It's not change, and it's not hope.
AUTHOR: Rush Limbaugh

QUOTE: Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather. It is your inner image of yourself, and if you look in there and see a man who won't cheat, then you know he never will.
AUTHOR: John D. MacDonald

QUOTE: My play Safe Sex was picked apart because critics thought it was untrue. It was a play in which no one had AIDS, but the characters talked about how it was going to change their lives.
AUTHOR: Harvey Fierstein

QUOTE: Civilization exists by geological consent, subject to change without notice.
AUTHOR: Will Durant

QUOTE: What looks absolutely fabulous in rehearsal can fall flat in front of an audience. The audience dictates what you do or don't change.
AUTHOR: Harvey Fierstein

QUOTE: All the principles of heaven and earth are living inside you. Life itself is truth, and this will never change. Everything in heaven and earth breathes. Breath is the thread that ties creation together.
AUTHOR: Morihei Ueshiba

QUOTE: A conception not reducible to the small change of daily experience is like a currency not exchangeable for articles of consumption it is not a symbol, but a fraud.
AUTHOR: George Santayana

QUOTE: The Roman Catholic Church isn't going to change its theologies.
AUTHOR: Robert H. Schuller

QUOTE: People can cry much easier than they can change.
AUTHOR: James A. Baldwin

QUOTE: Both tears and sweat are salty, but they render a different result. Tears will get you sympathy sweat will get you change.
AUTHOR: Jesse Jackson

QUOTE: I can be almost terminally grief-stricken because things are so dire, but at the same time, there's a real lightheartedness about just the recoverability of life, of how things change, how they're not the same, ever again.
AUTHOR: Alice Walker

QUOTE: No art can be noble which is incapable of expressing thought, and no art is capable of expressing thought which does not change.
AUTHOR: John Ruskin

QUOTE: There's no reason to change what you are, but if you're not being you, then you need to acknowledge that.
AUTHOR: Marilyn Manson

QUOTE: Excuses change nothing, but make everyone feel better.
AUTHOR: Mason Cooley

QUOTE: Any change is resisted because bureaucrats have a vested interest in the chaos in which they exist.
AUTHOR: Richard M. Nixon

QUOTE: Know what's weird? Day by day, nothing seems to change. But pretty soon, everything's different.
AUTHOR: Bill Watterson

QUOTE: Growing up going to Christian school and the concept that you're born a sinner and you don't really have a choice to change who you are has been hammered into my head and created the entire reason why I made art and made a band and made records called 'Antichrist Superstar.'
AUTHOR: Marilyn Manson

QUOTE: In the long term we can hope that religion will change the nature of man and reduce conflict. But history is not encouraging in this respect. The bloodiest wars in history have been religious wars.
AUTHOR: Richard M. Nixon

QUOTE: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
AUTHOR: John Henry Newman

QUOTE: In Britain, like most of the developed world, stem-cell research is regarded as a great opportunity. America will be left behind if it doesn't change policy.
AUTHOR: Stephen Hawking

QUOTE: I haven't got the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out.
AUTHOR: David Sedaris

QUOTE: As life runs on, the road grows strange with faces new - and near the end. The milestones into headstones change, Neath every one a friend.
AUTHOR: James Russell Lowell

QUOTE: One of the many things nobody ever tells you about middle age is that it's such a nice change from being young.
AUTHOR: William Feather

QUOTE: Satire doesn't effect change.
AUTHOR: P. J. O'Rourke

QUOTE: There are plenty of problems in the world, and doubtless climate change - or whatever the currently voguish phrase for it all is - certainly is one of them. But it's low on my list.
AUTHOR: P. J. O'Rourke

QUOTE: All change is bad. But sometimes it has to be done.
AUTHOR: P. J. O'Rourke

QUOTE: Such is the state of life, that none are happy but by the anticipation of change: the change itself is nothing when we have made it, the next wish is to change again.
AUTHOR: Samuel Johnson

QUOTE: I was married to someone who wanted me to change. Become more adult, more responsible. I began not to like myself, not like what I do. I lost my identity. Everything began collapsing around me.
AUTHOR: Marilyn Manson

QUOTE: Exploiting people's emotions of fear, envy and anxiety is not hope, it's not change, it's partisanship. We don't need partisanship. We don't need demagoguery, we need solutions.
AUTHOR: Paul Ryan

QUOTE: Millions of young Americans have graduated from college during the Obama presidency, ready to use their gifts and get moving in life. Half of them can't find the work they studied for, or any work at all. So here's the question: Without a change in leadership, why would the next four years be any different from the last four years?
AUTHOR: Paul Ryan

QUOTE: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
AUTHOR: Robin Williams

QUOTE: Nothing is so perfectly amusing as a total change of ideas.
AUTHOR: Laurence Sterne

QUOTE: The way of the Creative works through change and transformation, so that each thing receives its true nature and destiny and comes into permanent accord with the Great Harmony: this is what furthers and what perseveres.
AUTHOR: Alexander Pope

QUOTE: I still believe that if your aim is to change the world, journalism is a more immediate short-term weapon.
AUTHOR: Tom Stoppard

QUOTE: As another has well said, to handicap a student by teaching him that his black face is a curse and that his struggle to change his condition is hopeless is the worst sort of lynching.
AUTHOR: Carter G. Woodson

QUOTE: The hope and change the Democrats had in mind was nothing more than a retread of the failed and discredited socialist policies that have been the enemy of freedom for centuries all over the world. I fear America is teetering towards tyranny.
AUTHOR: Jim DeMint

QUOTE: As you navigate through the rest of your life, be open to collaboration. Other people and other people's ideas are often better than your own. Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you, spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
AUTHOR: Amy Poehler

QUOTE: Change is certain. Peace is followed by disturbances departure of evil men by their return. Such recurrences should not constitute occasions for sadness but realities for awareness, so that one may be happy in the interim.
AUTHOR: Percy Bysshe Shelley

QUOTE: As human beings, we are vulnerable to confusing the unprecedented with the improbable. In our everyday experience, if something has never happened before, we are generally safe in assuming it is not going to happen in the future, but the exceptions can kill you and climate change is one of those exceptions.
AUTHOR: Al Gore

QUOTE: We have a powerful potential in out youth, and we must have the courage to change old ideas and practices so that we may direct their power toward good ends.
AUTHOR: Mary McLeod Bethune

QUOTE: We teach people that they upset themselves. We can't change the past, so we change how people are thinking, feeling and behaving today.
AUTHOR: Albert Ellis

QUOTE: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while.
AUTHOR: Jack Welch

QUOTE: Words do not change their meanings so drastically in the course of centuries as, in our minds, names do in the course of a year or two.
AUTHOR: Marcel Proust

QUOTE: Some people change when they think they're a star or something.
AUTHOR: Paris Hilton

QUOTE: To me, eyewear goes way beyond being a prescription. It's like makeup. It's the most incredible accessory. The shape of a frame or the color of lenses can change your whole appearance.
AUTHOR: Vera Wang

QUOTE: I want to change things for the better, just like everybody else.
AUTHOR: Henry Rollins

QUOTE: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.
AUTHOR: Jackie Chan

QUOTE: My greatest challenge has been to change the mindset of people. Mindsets play strange tricks on us. We see things the way our minds have instructed our eyes to see.
AUTHOR: Muhammad Yunus

QUOTE: Negroes - Sweet and docile, Meek, humble, and kind: Beware the day - They change their mind.
AUTHOR: Langston Hughes

QUOTE: Change of weather is the discourse of fools.
AUTHOR: Thomas Fuller

QUOTE: Ah! how annoying that the law doesn't allow a woman to change husbands just as one does shirts.
AUTHOR: Moliere

QUOTE: You know, I don't really do that much looking inside me when I'm working on a project. Whatever I am becomes what that film is. But I change you change.
AUTHOR: Steven Spielberg

QUOTE: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being.
AUTHOR: Lee Iacocca

QUOTE: You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change.
AUTHOR: John Cleese

QUOTE: I am not trying to change the world. I am just offering my gift that God gave me, and if somebody is moved by it, that's beautiful.
AUTHOR: Lenny Kravitz

QUOTE: People are starting to go on about my weight but I'm not going to change my size because they don't like the way I look.
AUTHOR: Adele

QUOTE: But I think talent as a writer is hard-wired in, it's all there, at least the basic elements of it. You can't change it any more than you can choose whether to be right handed or left handed.
AUTHOR: Stephen King

QUOTE: There are many things we do not want about the world. Let us not just mourn them. Let us change them.
AUTHOR: Ferdinand Marcos

QUOTE: My notion of a wife at 40 is that a man should be able to change her, like a bank note, for two 20s.
AUTHOR: Warren Beatty

QUOTE: No change in musical style will survive unless it is accompanied by a change in clothing style. Rock is to dress up to.
AUTHOR: Frank Zappa

QUOTE: People got insights into what was bothering them, but they hardly did a damn thing to change.
AUTHOR: Albert Ellis

QUOTE: Change happens by listening and then starting a dialogue with the people who are doing something you don't believe is right.
AUTHOR: Jane Goodall

QUOTE: You can change friends but not neighbours.
AUTHOR: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

QUOTE: We like to think about how smart we are. But I think talent as a writer is hard-wired in, it's all there, at least the basic elements of it. You can't change it any more than you can choose whether to be right handed or left handed.
AUTHOR: Stephen King

QUOTE: Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.
AUTHOR: David Herbert Lawrence

QUOTE: Swearing is industry language. For as long as we're alive it's not going to change. You've got to be boisterous to get results.
AUTHOR: Gordon Ramsay

QUOTE: If people don't like me for whatever I do, for being me, then that's too bad. I don't want to change to be something that I'm not for other people to like me.
AUTHOR: Vanessa Hudgens

QUOTE: Strong characters are brought out by change of situation, and gentle ones by permanence.
AUTHOR: Jean Paul

QUOTE: In America the schools have become too permissive, the kids now are controlling the schools, the tail is wagging the dog. We've got to make a change there and get it back to where the teachers have control of the classrooms.
AUTHOR: Chuck Norris

QUOTE: Hip-hop is supposed to uplift and create, to educate people on a larger level and to make a change.
AUTHOR: Doug E. Fresh

QUOTE: In a free society, government reflects the soul of its people. If people want change at the top, they will have to live in different ways. Our major social problems are not the cause of our decadence. They are a reflection of it.
AUTHOR: Cal Thomas

QUOTE: We used to think that revolutions are the cause of change. Actually it is the other way around: change prepares the ground for revolution.
AUTHOR: Eric Hoffer

QUOTE: Folks, the most insidious part of this whole health care scheme is that all of these vast medical expenditures will become nothing more than government budget items. We individuals will no longer exist. The relationship between a government and citizen will change forever.
AUTHOR: Rush Limbaugh

QUOTE: We have domesticated God's transcendence. We often learn about God at about the same time as we are learning about Santa Claus but our ideas about Santa Claus change, mature and become more nuanced, whereas our ideas of God can remain at a rather infantile level.
AUTHOR: Karen Armstrong

QUOTE: We should learn to accept that change is truly the only thing that's going on always, and learn to ride with it and enjoy it.
AUTHOR: Alice Walker

QUOTE: We first fought... in the name of religion, then Communism, and now in the name of drugs and terrorism. Our excuses for global domination always change.
AUTHOR: Serj Tankian

QUOTE: Opinions alter, manners change, creeds rise and fall, but the moral laws are written on the table of eternity.
AUTHOR: Lord Acton

QUOTE: I have always thought that change you can see and feel is best.
AUTHOR: Henry Rollins

QUOTE: I don't think people change. I think they definitely mature. But I think the essence of what I am today is the same as when I was five years old. It's just maturity. I've become a healthier, fuller expression of that essence.
AUTHOR: Ricky Williams

QUOTE: What starts the process, really, are laughs and slights and snubs when you are a kid. If your anger is deep enough and strong enough, you learn that you can change those attitudes by excellence, personal gut performance.
AUTHOR: Richard M. Nixon

QUOTE: Well I do think, when there are more women, that the tone of the conversation changes, and also the goals of the conversation change. But it doesn't mean that the whole world would be a lot better if it were totally run by women. If you think that, you've forgotten high school.
AUTHOR: Madeleine Albright

QUOTE: While the river of life glides along smoothly, it remains the same river only the landscape on either bank seems to change.
AUTHOR: Max Muller

QUOTE: Peace of mind comes from not wanting to change others.
AUTHOR: Gerald Jampolsky

QUOTE: Ignorance is always afraid of change.
AUTHOR: Jawaharlal Nehru

QUOTE: I'm a Gemini, so I change my mind every day.
AUTHOR: Natalie Portman

QUOTE: I have always argued that change becomes stressful and overwhelming only when you've lost any sense of the constancy of your life. You need firm ground to stand on. From there, you can deal with that change.
AUTHOR: Richard Nelson Bolles

QUOTE: Work and struggle and never accept an evil that you can change.
AUTHOR: Andre Gide

QUOTE: Men may change their climate, but they cannot change their nature. A man that goes out a fool cannot ride or sail himself into common sense.
AUTHOR: Joseph Addison

QUOTE: Americans have so far put up with inequality because they felt they could change their status. They didn't mind others being rich, as long as they had a path to move up as well. The American Dream is all about social mobility in a sense - the idea that anyone can make it.
AUTHOR: Fareed Zakaria

QUOTE: Change means movement. Movement means friction. Only in the frictionless vacuum of a nonexistent abstract world can movement or change occur without that abrasive friction of conflict.
AUTHOR: Saul Alinsky

QUOTE: It is not necessary to change. Survival is not mandatory.
AUTHOR: W. Edwards Deming

QUOTE: The most useless are those who never change through the years.
AUTHOR: James M. Barrie

QUOTE: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
AUTHOR: Anthony J. D'Angelo

QUOTE: Those who visit foreign nations, but associate only with their own country-men, change their climate, but not their customs. They see new meridians, but the same men and with heads as empty as their pockets, return home with traveled bodies, but untravelled minds.
AUTHOR: Charles Caleb Colton

QUOTE: It is proof of a base and low mind for one to wish to think with the masses or majority, merely because the majority is the majority. Truth does not change because it is, or is not, believed by a majority of the people.
AUTHOR: Giordano Bruno

QUOTE: Let the great world spin for ever down the ringing grooves of change.
AUTHOR: Alfred Lord Tennyson

QUOTE: Habits change into character.
AUTHOR: Ovid

QUOTE: Every daring attempt to make a great change in existing conditions, every lofty vision of new possibilities for the human race, has been labeled Utopian.
AUTHOR: Emma Goldman

QUOTE: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
AUTHOR: Joyce Meyer

QUOTE: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
AUTHOR: Les Brown

QUOTE: You want to balance the budget in this country? We change the salary structure for Congress and the President. Every year they don't balance the budget, we don't pay them.
AUTHOR: Daniel Keys Moran

QUOTE: Change brings opportunities. On the other hand, change can be confusing.
AUTHOR: Michael Porter

QUOTE: Finishing food is about the tiny touches. In the last seconds you can change everything.
AUTHOR: Mario Batali

QUOTE: So I think it's - what was important to me is that I found that I can't change the fact that people already have made an opinion about me. But I don't think that should stop me from trying to correct some of the misperceptions that are out there.
AUTHOR: Monica Lewinsky

QUOTE: There are many challenges, there are many obstacles let us try to change the obstacles to advantages.
AUTHOR: Harri Holkeri

QUOTE: I don't change. The things around me change.
AUTHOR: Jeremy Renner

QUOTE: Doubt is an uneasy and dissatisfied state from which we struggle to free ourselves and pass into the state of belief while the latter is a calm and satisfactory state which we do not wish to avoid, or to change to a belief in anything else.
AUTHOR: Charles Sanders Peirce

QUOTE: I was born left-handed, but I was made to use my other hand. When I was writing 'Famished Road,' which was very long, I got repetitive stress syndrome. My right wrist collapsed, so I started using my left hand. The prose I wrote with my left hand came out denser, so later on I had to change it.
AUTHOR: Ben Okri

QUOTE: Whoever is content with the world, and who profits from its lack of justice, does not want to change it.
AUTHOR: Friedrich Durrenmatt

QUOTE: But I think it's more that when you're young, you're invincible, you're immortal - or at least you think you are. The possibilities are limitless, you're inventing the future. Then you get older and suddenly you have a history. It's fixed. You can't change anything. I find that a bit disturbing, to be honest.
AUTHOR: Damien Hirst

QUOTE: Worry is a useless mulling over of things we cannot change.
AUTHOR: Peace Pilgrim

QUOTE: If you continually write and read yourself as a fiction, you can change what's crushing you.
AUTHOR: Jeanette Winterson

QUOTE: Obama has no power to change American policy because there are people who specialize in drawing these policies, which have been and still are hostile towards Islam.
AUTHOR: Muqtada al Sadr

QUOTE: I don't write for any group. I write to bring about a change in consciousness.
AUTHOR: Jeanette Winterson

QUOTE: And I do believe that the way to change a society, to uplift people - not just their spirit, but to uplift their society and economic base - is through education.
AUTHOR: Rainn Wilson

QUOTE: I don't read reviews because by then it's too late - whatever anyone says, the book won't change. It is written.
AUTHOR: Jeanette Winterson

QUOTE: You know, Motorcycle Diaries has no incredible stories, no sudden plot twists, it doesn't play that way. It's about recognizing that instance of change and embracing it.
AUTHOR: Gael Garcia Bernal

QUOTE: Sometimes when we are generous in small, barely detectable ways it can change someone else's life forever.
AUTHOR: Margaret Cho

QUOTE: The Bush-Cheney administration had betrayed some basic American values. So there was hunger for change.
AUTHOR: Al Gore

QUOTE: I'd say that after my father passed my writing changed, it went deeper. Most would say 'matured' but I don't think I'd use that word in relation to my progress. I think 'change' is a little more accurate.
AUTHOR: Rick Springfield

QUOTE: I do genuinely believe that the political system is not linear. When it reaches a tipping point fashioned by a critical mass of opinion, the slow pace of change we're used to will no longer be the norm. I see a lot of signs every day that we're moving closer and closer to that tipping point.
AUTHOR: Al Gore

QUOTE: There are those people who are in your corner no matter what, you can't do any wrong, even when you do wrong. And then there are those people that no matter what you do they are going to dislike you and that's not going to change.
AUTHOR: Brett Favre

QUOTE: Pick up a rifle and you change instantly from a subject to a citizen.
AUTHOR: Jeff Cooper

QUOTE: We are all born with a unique genetic blueprint, which lays out the basic characteristics of our personality as well as our physical health and appearance... And yet, we all know that life experiences do change us.
AUTHOR: Joan D. Vinge

QUOTE: Injuries obviously change the way you approach the game.
AUTHOR: Brett Favre

QUOTE: I had a very insightful friend who warned me back when I stopped reading scripts, 'It's easier to change directions while you're still moving.' If you stop, it's harder to get started again. I still don't think I made the wrong decision, but he was right.
AUTHOR: Debra Winger

QUOTE: Styles, like everything else, change. Style doesn't.
AUTHOR: Linda Ellerbee

QUOTE: We have no reason to think that climate change is harmful if you look at the world as a whole. Most places, in fact, are better off being warmer than being colder. And historically, the really bad times for the environment and for people have been the cold periods rather than the warm periods.

QUOTE: It's better to get smart than to get mad. I try not to get so insulted that I will not take advantage of an opportunity to persuade people to change their minds.
AUTHOR: John H. Johnson

QUOTE: If you don't like the way the world is, you change it. You have an obligation to change it. You just do it one step at a time.
AUTHOR: Marian Wright Edelman

QUOTE: I wrote seven Myron Bolitar novels in a row, and I never want to write a Myron book where he just solves a crime. Every one of them I want to be personal, and I want him to grow and change. AUTHOR: Harlan Coben

QUOTE: Change is not a destination, just as hope is not a strategy.
AUTHOR: Rudy Giuliani

QUOTE: A leopard does not change his spots, or change his feeling that spots are rather a credit.

QUOTE: The Howard Hughes I knew began to change after his plane crash in 1941.
AUTHOR: Gene Tierney

QUOTE: I want art to make me think. In order to do that, it may piss me off, or make me uncomfortable. That promotes awareness and change, or at least some discussion.

AUTHOR: Eddie Izzard

QUOTE: Governments cannot make marriages or turn feckless individuals into responsible citizens. That needs another kind of change agent.
AUTHOR: Jonathan Sacks

QUOTE: I don't want to clip on the armour every morning. I've seen some politicians do this and they get a bit mangled and bitter. I just refuse to do that. I refuse to be angry or bitter or complain, and I remain open. I may sometimes be a bit too open but I'm not going to change that one bit.
AUTHOR: Nick Clegg

QUOTE: Much can and must be done by governments, but they cannot of themselves change lives.
AUTHOR: Jonathan Sacks

QUOTE: Most of what needs to be changed in the euro zone can be done without treaty changes. The demand for treaty change is as political as it is legal and I don't think it's going to happen soon.
AUTHOR: Nick Clegg

QUOTE: Europe is dying. That is one of the unsayable truths of our time. We are undergoing the moral equivalent of climate change and no one is talking about it.
AUTHOR: Jonathan Sacks

QUOTE: What creates freedom? A revolution in the streets? Mass protest? Civil war? A change of government? The ousting of the old guard and its replacement by the new? History, more often than not, shows that hopes raised by such events are often dashed, sooner rather than later.
AUTHOR: Jonathan Sacks

QUOTE: My kid could get a bad X-ray and I could get a call from the doctor saying I have something growing in my bum and that would change my perspective on everything instantaneously, on what is and what is not important.
AUTHOR: Tom Hanks

QUOTE: You do have to change things as warfare changes.
AUTHOR: Charles Schumer

QUOTE: A man's character may be learned from the adjectives which he habitually uses in conversation.
AUTHOR: Mark Twain

QUOTE: Truthful words are not beautiful beautiful words are not truthful. Good words are not persuasive persuasive words are not good.
AUTHOR: Lao Tzu

QUOTE: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
AUTHOR: George Bernard Shaw

QUOTE: Electric communication will never be a substitute for the face of someone who with their soul encourages another person to be brave and true.

QUOTE: I'm a great believer that any tool that enhances communication has profound effects in terms of how people can learn from each other, and how they can achieve the kind of freedoms that they're interested in.

QUOTE: Any problem, big or small, within a family, always seems to start with bad communication. Someone isn't listening.

QUOTE: Take advantage of every opportunity to practice your communication skills so that when important occasions arise, you will have the gift, the style, the sharpness, the clarity, and the emotions to affect other people.

QUOTE: By and large, language is a tool for concealing the truth.

QUOTE: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.

QUOTE: I learned never to empty the well of my writing, but always to stop when there was still something there in the deep part of the well, and let it refill at night from the springs that fed it.

QUOTE: Of all of our inventions for mass communication, pictures still speak the most universally understood language.

QUOTE: First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak.

QUOTE: Be still when you have nothing to say when genuine passion moves you, say what you've got to say, and say it hot.

QUOTE: Photography is more than a medium for factual communication of ideas. It is a creative art.
AUTHOR: Ansel Adams

QUOTE: Every day I try to be in communication with the universe in an unconscious way.
AUTHOR: Paulo Coelho

QUOTE: The game of life is a game of boomerangs. Our thoughts, deeds and words return to us sooner or later with astounding accuracy.

QUOTE: Bad human communication leaves us less room to grow.

QUOTE: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.

QUOTE: The communication of the dead is tongued with fire beyond the language of the living.

QUOTE: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind.

QUOTE: There is no pleasure to me without communication: there is not so much as a sprightly thought comes into my mind that it does not grieve me to have produced alone, and that I have no one to tell it to.

QUOTE: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it.

QUOTE: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.

AUTHOR: Harold S. Geneen

QUOTE: I was raised to believe in myself. I know I'm cool. I'm not trying to brag or say I'm the man or anything like that. I don't lie or cheat, and I'm not mean to anybody. I treat people with respect.
